title: I remember when this game used to be fun
body:
I miss the days, where all champs where fun and viable, mana, spell vamp and AD shaco was fun. I remember the old 3's map and how much better it was then the current map. I remember when games weren't always lopsided and actually seemed competitive.

I remember before millennials and little kids claimed everything under the sun was toxic and before the internet was made child friendly, spinkled with lollipops and rainbows.

I remember when this game used to be fun...

replies.body:
As one who has played both, I prefer the new TT.

Almost every champ is viable and fun in my opinion.

I like not having to be worried every time I queue up that someone is going to harass me all game. Also, very few people are offended by anything you say. We are annoyed and don't want to play with you, not offended.

You meaning whoever is being toxic, not necissarily OP.

EDIT: I don't know much about Shaco's builds or how they have changed, sorry for my ignorance.
Game is still fun, we just have to tread carefully and hope we dont offend some punk little kid when we tell them to stop dying so much.
Just getting the bump to keep those Toxic downvotes going.

Saying as much as "WOW" or "OMG" or "WTF" will get you labeled as toxic and get the 12y/o raging and not playing. It's pretty impressive how much these games cater to those people anymore.

Definitely not everything is viable in 3's, you either play the most op/staple champs or lose. It's really that simple. Every one in idk 5 games you can get away with a non T1 champ as long as someone is carrying you, that is. Just not fun. OVER 100 Champs and you fight the same 10 endlessly.
Don't forget to write toxic while you downvote!
